Setting.Name: Word to Spell (leave this empty if random)

Comment.Text: Here the data is streamed from the server to a file.
The P300 Speller Visualisation sends the markers (stimulations) directly to Acquisition Server using TCP Tagging.
You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1

The use of these P300 examples are described in
http://openvibe.inria.fr/openvibe-p300-speller/

Overview This scenario can be used as a first step to collect some training data. The data will later be used to train a classifier for online use. The flast sequence will start after 20 sec. You will then be presented a blue letter that you have to focus on, followed by a 12 times flashing sequence of the whole grid. This will be repeated 10 times. note: the recorded files go to the folder where the scenario xml is located (${Player_ScenarioDirectory}/).
